intro: ^. Sit down and I'll be right there... I want to talk to you!
Chat1: ^Lila?Smiling "Things here have been getting busier every day! Im glad Mrs. Lee is here- I've been running around all day. It's nice to have you as my excuse to sit for a second!"

s: ^Oh, I'm always happy to be an excuse for a break!
^I'm so glad you and Mrs. Lee have each other! Is it okay if I ask you about her?

Chat2: ^Lila?Smiling "Thanks! I've been meaning to thank you for supporting Mrs. Lee. She told me you have two have been talking."

s: ^She's so great! I'm happy to help.

Chat3: ^Lila?Smiling "She trusts you, which is why I'm cool asking you this."
Explain1: ^Lila?Neutral "Yeah, she scheduled it and i’m really proud of her for taking a proactive role in her health. Do you remember her husband? He was Dr Lee?"

s: ^Yeah, she has told me a little bit about him.
^I never met him, but he and Mr. Calindas were friends.

Explain2: ^Lila?Neutral "He was very traditional in some ways, and I don't think she took much control over things. She’s been kind of shocked since he passed… probably until the last few months with Eddie away at school."
^Lila?Neutral "She’s stepped up in her life, big time! And, wow, this past week since you’ve been talking with and supporting her,
^Lila?Neutral "I've been trying to brainstorm ways we can make Mrs. Lee more comfortable with her appointment."

s: ^I think she's even more anxious about this than the pharmacy!

Suggestion1: ^Lila_Day 3_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to go to her doctor appointment_Mrslee3-2

Suggestion1.#: notification Lila_Day 3_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to go to her doctor appointment_Mrslee3-2

Suggestion1: ^Lila?Smiling "We could suggest that I will go to the appointment with her. She might not even know that having a friend along is an option."

s: ^Hmmm. What are the downsides to that idea?

OptionalQuestDetails1: ^Lila?Neutral "I don't want her to think she's only capable if she has someone along with her. So, it might be better to encourage her to take more of an active role."

s: ^Excellent point! We want to build her up, not make her feel more reliant!

Suggestion2: ^Lila_Day 3_Mrs. Lee could call Eddie and practice her questions with him_Mrslee3-1

Suggestion2.#: notification Lila_Day 3_Mrs. Lee could call Eddie and practice her questions with him_Mrslee3-1

Suggestion2: ^Lila?Neutral "When Eddie was home, he mentioned that he'd like to be more involved. You know how she has regular video chats with her Korean friends? I think he's a little jealous."

^Lila?Smiling "After I was done teasing him, I realized that he'd be a great resource for helping Mrs. Lee feel more confident. They looked over drug portal information and read up on high blood pressure together, and she was just so much calmer."
^Lila?Smiling "He knows how to use the tools, and could help her feel more in control. Plus, it would give him a deeper insight into his family medical history."

s: ^Huh..We should ask her what she thinks!
^Oh! I like that a lot! It would do both of them good!

Goodbye: ^Lila?Smiling "Oh, shoot, I gotta get back to work. I hope this was helpful. Let me know!"
